allData.occupation: Data & AI Leader • Author of FairTech • Advisory Board Member • Forbes 30 Under 30 • Capital 40 Under 40 • LinkedIn Top Voice • Top 15 Women in AI (Manager Magazin)

positions.title: Strategy & Operations - Global Lead ESG Strategy, Data & AI
positions.description:
My heart beats for Technology and Impact.

Axel Springer is an international media and technology company and operating in more than 40 countries. The portfolio currently consists of over 250 companies such as Business Insider, Politico, idealo and StepStone.

Achievements: 
- Built and led Global ESG Strategy for Data & AI, incl. strategic initiatives, while establishing it as guidance for Axel Springer 's diverse companies.
- Identified Strategic KPIs and led development of Axel Springer ESG Management Dashboard with Tableau and AWS for Executive Board.
- Created strategic presentations for the Executive and Supervisory Board and provided reportings for stakeholders.
- Contributed to AI Ethics guidelines and created briefings on regulatory and technical compliance topics such as Responsible AI and EU AI Act.
- Trained over 656 employees on Responsible AI, Data & AI Literacy within the Axel Springer group.
- Positioned Axel Springer as a thought leader by creating impactful content, delivering talks and hosting events, generating over 757,842 impressions from 34 company-related LinkedIn posts in one year.
- Selected for C-Level Potential Program by the Global Talent & Executive Development team, recognizing my leadership and strategic capabilities.

positions.title: Founder inbetween Community
positions.description: Founded “inbetween”, Axel Springer group-wide Employee Resource Group for cultural diversity with an engaged community of over 60 employees

positions.title: Founder
positions.description:
I founded Europe's first lobby and consulting organization whose mission is to positively transform the tech industry by increasing diversity, equity and inclusion and incorporate AI ethics into the tech industry.

Entrepreneurship, Strategy & Business Development
• Developed and executed a Go-to-Market strategy that facilitated collaborations with prestigious companies including Meta, Yelp, AXA, Porsche, Intel, IBM, Samsung, BMW, and others. Managed the full sales cycle by qualifying opportunities, promoting services, capturing requirements, and successfully implementing projects for clients.
• Directed high-impact PR and marketing campaigns that secured features on Forbes, Business Insider, and other major news outlets. Cultivated influential relationships with key business and political stakeholders, leveraging executive-level communication skills.
• Translated business concepts into thought leadership on Diversity in Technology, Data Analytics, and AI. Recognized with multiple awards, including Forbes 30 Under 30 List.

Public Speaking, Thought Leadership & Event Management
• Delivered workshops and talks on Diversity in Tech, AI Ethics and Data for various organizations such as Google, SAP and Deutsche Telekom
• Organized community events for tech related topics
• Shaped public debates with opinion pieces for t3n and Business Punk
• Encouraged women and people of color to kick-start their career in the tech industry
• Grew social media following to 3.4k followers across channels (Instagram, LinkedIn)

Campaigns, Advocacy & Developer Relations
• Created school teaching material on Algorithm Fairness with SPIEGEL Ed and Schwarzkopf-Stiftung
• Led developer relations campaign in EMEA region for TigerGraph
• Influenced the 2021 German Federal Election by approaching SPIEGEL who contacted parties on behalf of us to share their position on Diversity in Tech

positions.title: Forbes 30 Under 30 Listmaker
positions.description: Honoured as Forbes 30 under 30 listmaker for outstanding contributions towards diversity in tech and AI ethics with Inclusive Tech

positions.title: Advisory Board Member
positions.description: Advisory Board Member for human, Germany’s pioneering magazine on Artificial Intelligence, with a quarterly circulation of 40,000 copies. Responsible for guiding editorial direction and strategic vision

certifications.name: Machine Learning with TensorFlow on Google Cloud Platform
Data Engineering on Google Cloud Platform

honors.title: Impact of Diversity Award in the category "Most Influencial Woman"
honors.description: I was awarded the Impact of Diversity Award in the category "Most Influencial Woman", supported by Accenture. This award honours outstanding diversity concepts from leading companies, inspiring initiatives and committed individuals.

honors.title: Top 100 Women for Diversity
honors.description:
With the Top 100 Women for Diversity, the diversity initiative BeyondGenderAgenda is honoring personalities who significantly advance the topics of Diversity, Equity & Inclusion in the German business world through their extraordinary commitment to diversity and equal opportunity.

Link: https://beyondgenderagenda.com/kampagnen/top100/

honors.title: Global Top 100 Leaders
honors.description:
March8 honored my contribution to the tech industry in Europe by including me in their Global Top 100 Leaders list.

Link: https://march8.com/magazine/march8-top-100

honors.title: Digital Female Leader Award
honors.description: Global Digital Women acknowledged my work in the tech industry with the Digital Female Leader Award.

honors.title: LinkedIn Top Voice
honors.description:
I have been recognized by the LinkedIn News DACH Team as „LinkedIn Top Voice“ twice for sharing content on topics surrounding Big Data, AI and Diversity in Tech.

LinkedIn Top Voice - Technology & Innovation: https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/linkedin%2Dtop%2Dvoices%2Dtechnologie%2Dund%2Dinnovation%2D2022%2D/
LinkedIn Top Voice - Diversity: https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/linkedin-top-voices-2022-zum-internationalen-frauentag-/

honors.title: Forbes 30 Under 30
honors.description:
The business magazine Forbes has chosen Mina Saidze as one of the most promising talents in their "30 under 30" rankings in the category „Tech“ for the DACH region. The members of the 30 Under 30 list are the result of reporter research and thousands of online nominations. A shortlist of candidates, compiled by editors and reporters, were reviewed by an expert panel of judges.

Link: https://www.forbes.at/artikel/mina-saidze.html

honors.title: Top 10 Business Influencer for "Tech"
honors.description: The business magazine STRIVE counted me among the Top 10 Influencers for the category "Tech" in the DACH region.

volunteerExperiences.description: The Women Techmakers Program provides visibility, community, and resources for Women in Technology to drive participation and innovation in the field.

volunteerExperiences.role: Bertelsmann Foundation - Ethics of Artificial Intelligence
volunteerExperiences.description:
The Bertelsmann Foundation is a renowned organization with the aim to identify social challenges and problems early on and to develop and implement model solutions. It has a focus on the future of the European Union and its relations with neighbouring regions.

I was acknowledged as expert on Ethics of Artificial Intelligence by the foundation.

human is Germany’s first magazine for all who want to learn about artificial intelligence and benefit from the opportunities of AI developments for their working lives. It is a platform for fundamental orientation, lively knowledge transfer and practical utility value around humans and AI. 

The magazine was founded by Rebekka Reinhard, one of Germany’s most prominent voices in philosophy and literature. The Advisory Board consists of thought leaders from business and society including Alexander Doll (former Board Member Deutsche Bahn), Stephanie Schorp and Andreas Föller (Founder Comites).

Our Advisory Board is an informal, interdisciplinary body of people with a wide range of expertise from the "old" and "new" business world. This diversity of perspectives is very important to us. The Advisory Board Members provide ideas and impulses for topics and also appear as contributors in interviews or with their own essay in the first issue.

allData.headline: Data & AI Leader • Author of FairTech • Advisory Board Member • Forbes 30 Under 30 • Capital 40 Under 40 • LinkedIn Top Voice • Top 15 Women in AI (Manager Magazin)
allData.summary:
As an award-winning Executive Leader, Author, LinkedIn Top Voice, Advisory Board Member and Founder with more than 8+ years of experience in the tech industry, I have been recognised by Manager Magazin as one of the most prominent voices in the field of Artificial Intelligence.

MY MISSION
Currently I am leading Data & AI Strategy for ESG at Axel Springer, Europe’s largest media and tech company. Furthermore, I founded Inclusive Tech, Europe's first initiative for Diversity in Tech and AI Ethics, which won several awards. I specialize in translating business needs into impactful strategies, processes and products. 

ACHIEVEMENTS I’M PROUD OF
▪ Thought Leader, LinkedIn Top Voice, Expert and Guest Lecturer on Responsible AI through
high-profile events (OMR, Forbes Women Summit), university lectures (HPI, TU Munich) & media visibility (ZDF, Spiegel).
▪ Expert in AI Ethics and Regulation: Enabling businesses to leverage responsible AI for growth while
ensuring compliance with EU AI Act and CSRD. Provided executive briefings and training.
▪ Recognized Industry Leader: Capital Top 40 under 40, and Forbes 30 Under 30 list maker.
▪ Strategic Partnerships: Built relations with global leaders (Intel, Adobe, Porsche). Represented brands at premier events, incl. WeAreDevelopers, Hannover Messe, and produced content for branding.
▪ Selected for Axel Springer C-Level Potential Program.
▪ Published author of the widely recognized book "FairTech: Rethinking Digitalization for a Just Society" at Bastei Lübbe influencing AI ethics discourse among public institutions, executives, universities.
▪ Founder of Inclusive Tech, an award-winning initiative for diversity in tech and AI Ethics. Recognized with Impact of Diversity Award by Accenture. Formed collaborations with industry (Yelp, Axa, Meta) and foundations (Koerber Foundation).
▪ Technical & Strategic Experience: Over 8 years in Data Strategy/Analytics in enterprise and start-ups. Developed Axel Springer ESG Management Dashboard, established function as first hire.
▪ Diversity Advocate: Founded inbetween, Axel Springer Employee Network for cultural diversity.

CONTACT: www.minasaidze.com | mail@minasaidze.com.

SUPER POWER: TECH + IMPACT
AI Governance, Responsible AI, Leadership, ESG Strategy, Data Analytics & Strategy, Executive Reporting, Stakeholder Management, Team Development, AI Compliance, B2B Marketing, LinkedIn Influencer

Tableau, Metabase, Google Data Studio, SQL, Python, Google Analytics, Tag Manager, GCP (BigQuery, Vertex AI), AWS (S3, Athena, Sagemaker), Postgres, Exasol, Jira, Confluence, Github, Git
